attributes.action: Purge the house and restore public confidence; call an Immediate General Election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given the scandal of MP's expenses and the loss in confidence in Parliament by the public, very clearly expressed in recent media, we petition the Prime Minister to do the right thing and call an immediate General Election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
